content:
DSBs in oncogene or tumor suppressor gene loci lead to gene amplification or loss, and mapping DSB hotspots in tumor genomes can identify novel cancer drivers and therapeutic targets.  
*Supporting evidence:* Amplification and deletion events at DSB sites are common in tumors [Beroukhim 2010]. DSB hotspots correlate with cancer driver genes [Menghi 2018, Nat Commun].

---
